remarks: The multiplicative monoid of a product is the product of the multiplicative monoids of the factors.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
prdsmgp.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsmgp.m $e |- M = ( mulGrp ` Y ) $.
prdsmgp.z $e |- Z = ( S Xs_ ( mulGrp o. R ) ) $.
prdsmgp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
prdsmgp.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
prdsmgp.r $e |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) $.
prdsmgp $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Base ` M ) = ( Base ` Z ) /\ ( +g ` M ) = ( +g ` Z ) ) ) $.
